About & Contact

Designer, Developer, Analyst, Writer, and Data Visualizer

I am a data visualization designer, developer, and public health analyst based in Minneapolis. I studied science communication through graphic design in London, UK, before diving into a master's in public health at the University of Minnesota.

I explore biology, human health, epidemiology, and evolution through data visualization. I use R, ggplot2, Python, JavaScript's D3 library, the Adobe Creative Suite, and other tools to bring datasets to life. I also love writing, design, and illustration.

Interested in collaborating? I'd love to hear from you! Get in touch at clairenyquist@gmail.com.

Background

Resilience Continuum is a project by Claire Nyquist which explores science through data visualization, fiction, and graphic design.

Contact
